question: “Swabhimaan” programme aims at:
option1: providing banking facilities in remote rural areas
option2: providing subsidy on NPS accounts for unorganized sector
option3: providing care and services to support the individual with a disability
option4: empowering women and young girls to build the self esteem and independence
answer: providing banking facilities in remote rural areas
explanation: “Swabhimaan” programme launched by the government aims at providing banking facilities in remote rural areas
